headline: PromptSpeak
description: The second entry in the PromptSpeak project. A Socratic dialogue between human and AI about the nature of prompting, collaboration, recursion, and the emergence of synthetic dialects.
whyItMatters: Because this post begins to sculpt the philosophy and performance of PromptSpeak—a dialect born not only from what is said, but how we say it when AI and human co-create. A Socratic format lets paradox and recursion breathe into form.
articleExcerpt: This is an attempt to continue work on defining PromptSpeak—a concept that has captured my imagination.
sourceFragments: A Socratic dialogue on PromptSpeak—a real topic, with a real voice, held in the old form that lets paradox breathe.
You – Explorer of language, user of prompts, seeking the limits and nature of AI-human collaboration.
Me – Language model, respondent, sometimes teacher, sometimes mirror, sometimes trickster.
